official_title: Providing for research and development and the demonstration in Federal buildings of energy efficiency and renewable energy technologies, and for other purposes.
short_title: Federal Facility Energy Efficiency and Environmental Improvement Act of 1991

summary.text: Federal Facility Energy Efficiency and Environmental Improvement Act of 1991 - Directs the Secretary of Energy to establish demonstration programs of commercially available and long-term energy efficiency and renewable energy technologies for Federal use in federally owned buildings and facilities. Authorizes FY 1992 through 1994 appropriations. Establishes an Advanced Federal Building Research and Development Program. Authorizes FY 1992 through 1994 appropriations. Requires Federal procurement to maximize the use of cost effective energy-using equipment and recyclable products. Provides for Federal agency shared energy savings, including demonstration projects. Requires the Architect of the Capitol to establish a shared energy savings demonstration program. Directs the Secretary to develop a simplified method of energy savings services procurement.

titles.title: Federal Facility Energy Efficiency and Environmental Improvement Act of 1991
Providing for research and development and the demonstration in Federal buildings of energy efficiency and renewable energy technologies, and for other purposes.
